pages.text: Despite their names, Whisperers are loud and odd creatures that can conjure forth quick growing vines to block their target's path, summon two Poison-Quill Vines and entangling roots upon their target's legs.

One can call these creatures through the use of a $(l:focuses/whispering_focus)Whispering Focus$(), or by right-clicking on the center Jungle Leaves of this configuration with an Animation Core for one without limited lifespan.
Right click the Moss Block with an Animation Core.
The creature can be healed by right-clicking on them with Bone Meals.
